name: DJI - Mini 4 Pro Fly More Combo Plus Drone and RC 2 Remote Control with Built-in Screen - Gray
description: Shop DJI Mini 4 Pro Fly More Combo Plus Drone and RC 2 Remote Control with Built-in Screen Gray at Best Buy. Find low everyday prices and buy online for delivery or in-store pick-up. Price Match Guarantee.

reviews.name: BEWARE OF REDZONES
reviews.reviewBody: This drone was complicated to begin with because I lived in the red zone, and had no idea what the red zone was. After the initial set up and the firmware update, GPS login account making, after all that it was totally worth it. Once I gained the confidence to fly the drone I was able to fly all over Huntington Beach Out to the ocean of Laguna Beach Newport with no problem with a single button to return back to home.  Quality camera and amazing engineering, image the future of drones. 1st drone and did learn how to maneuver drones off of “toy grade drones”. Once i got the functionality i made the jump to the Mini 4 Pro BEAST.   THE REMOTE IS QUALITY. 3 batteries all making the drone weigh about 290 grams makingnitnover the weight limit of 249 grams. The small 249 battery does not come with this set of 3 batteries. The batteries last about 30 minutes a flight, which is more than enough time to get the shot i seek. Great drone. Does way more than i know what to do with. Awesome and people love drones !

reviews.name: DJI Mini 4 Pro Drone: A Little Marvel in the World
reviews.reviewBody:
By far the king of lightweight drones!

The DJI Mini 4 Pro drone stands as a remarkable example of how big things often come in small packages. Despite its diminutive size, this drone packs a punch in the world of professional aerial photography. What truly sets it apart is its ability to capture breathtaking imagery. The camera quality is simply astounding for a drone of this size, offering clarity and detail that would satisfy even the most demanding of photographers.

Battery life is another area where the DJI Mini 4 Pro shines. It boasts an extremely efficient battery, ensuring longer flight times and more opportunities to capture those perfect shots. Whether you’re out for a leisurely flight or on a serious photography mission, this drone keeps going strong.

The remote control experience is nothing short of superb. It offers a seamless and intuitive control scheme, making it easy to maneuver the drone even for those who are new to flying. This ease of use extends to the drone’s overall functionality as well. It houses all the features expected in a professional film drone, yet remains accessible and straightforward to operate. This balance between professional capabilities and user-friendliness is truly commendable.

Not only is the DJI Mini 4 Pro an excellent choice for beginners, but it also appeals to professional pilots. The inclusion of obstacle avoidance and a user-friendly normal mode makes it a safe and enjoyable option for younger pilots. Meanwhile, the sport mode unlocks the drone’s full potential, allowing adult pilots to zip across the sky, capturing unbelievable images even in low-light conditions. The versatility of this drone is truly impressive.

In conclusion, the DJI Mini 4 Pro is more than just a drone. It’s a gateway to new heights in aerial photography, a tool that bridges the gap between amateur enthusiasts and professional filmmakers. Whether you’re starting out or looking to add a reliable, high-performing drone to your collection, the DJI Mini 4 Pro is a fantastic choice that comes highly recommended.

reviews.name: Mini 4 Pro
reviews.reviewBody: Great features. I've been flying the DJI Mini 4 Pro for a while now, and it’s amazing. The camera quality is top-notch, the battery lasts long, and it's super portable. The obstacle avoidance is a huge plus. Perfect for anyone, beginner or pro.

primaryImage.altText: The image shows a drone and its parts, including a remote control and a tablet. The drone is positioned above the remote control and tablet, which are placed on a table. The remote control is located on the left side of the tablet, while the tablet is situated on the right side. The drone is the main focus of the image, and it appears to be a small quadcopter.

CCD and CMOS are the two main technologies used in image sensors. CCD, the older of the two types, turns analog light signals into digital pixels. This conversion happens without distortion, resulting in high-quality images. Newer CMOS sensors use transistors at each pixel to move electrical charges. CMOS sensors are typically less expensive, but also require more light to create distortion-free images.

features.title: Under 249g, No Registration Is Required
features.description: Travel light and skip registration for a user-friendly, easy-to-carry experience on all your journeys. Enjoy the fun of flying without the tedious application process and waiting time.

features.title: Unleash Stunning Vertical Videos in 4K/60fps HDR
features.description: Perfectly showcases sunrise, sunset, and night scenes with impressive clarity. Share videos instantly without the need for post-cutting. Enjoy high-quality footage straight out of the camera!

features.title: Omnidirectional Obstacle Sensing for Enhanced Safety
features.description: With precise detection capabilities in all directions, you can fly with confidence, knowing that the drone will better detect obstacles. Worry less about collisions when flying, even first-time users!

features.title: Uninterrupted Flights with Extended Battery Life
features.description: Experience extended battery life for uninterrupted, longer flights. Say goodbye to battery anxiety, let nothing hold you back as you explore vast landscapes.

features.title: Immerse in Real-time Aerial Footage with 20km FHD Video Transmission
features.description: An essential for long flights and great high-quality visuals. Experience lag-free image transmission, immersing yourself in real-time aerial views like never before.

features.title: Customize Intelligent Tracking with Ease
features.description: Take control of your drone's tracking trajectory with the new ActiveTrack 360°. Achieve complex and seamless operation effects. Even if you're a beginner, getting started and capturing smooth videos is effortless.

features.title: Fly Responsibly
features.description: The following website may help you make informed decisions about flying your drone: KnowBeforeYouFly.org.  Additional state or local requirements may apply.  Check your local jurisdiction.

primaryImage.altText: Front. DJI - Neo Combo Drone - Gray.

descriptions.long: At 135 g, DJI Neo is an exceptionally lightweight and compact drone. Takeoff and land on your palm effortlessly without a remote controller, and capture cinematic footage with YOU in focus. Soar through breathtaking scenery, indoors and out, and be sure to include everybody in a group photo. Enjoy a fresh perspective on everyday life with DJI Neo.

features.title: Lightweight and Regulation Friendly
features.description: At just 135 g (4.76 oz), DJI Neo may be even lighter than your phone and does not require FAA registration and Remote ID. Throw Neo in your backpack or even your pocket. Just grab and go!

features.title: Palm Takeoff & Landing, Go Controller-Free
features.description: Neo takes off from your hand with just a push of a button. Neo's safe and easy operation makes it perfect for taking to family BBQs and hiking with friends.

features.title: AI Subject Tracking & QuickShots
features.description: Effortlessly capture stunning vlogs as DJI Neo smartly follows you. Getting professional footage has never been easier with eight creative QuickShots modes.

features.title: Multiple Control Options, Flexible Fun
features.description: Fly Neo controller-free or with voice control (EN/CN), mobile app, or RC. Capture an epic birthday or film a family picnic; these versatile options make it easy for everyone to try.

features.title: 4K Ultra-Stabilized Video
features.description: Whether you're hiking, kayaking, or just strolling in a windy park, DJI stabilization technology, level-4 wind resistance, and 4K UHD combine to ensure smooth, high-quality footage.

features.title: Full-Coverage Propeller Guards
features.description: Enjoy worry-free flights with full protection. Capture close-range shots safely, making it ideal for family gatherings, kids' playtime, or exploring indoor spaces without risk.

name: DJI - Geek Squad Certified Refurbished Mini 3 Fly More Combo Drone with Remote Controller with a Screen - Gray
description: Shop DJI Geek Squad Certified Refurbished Mini 3 Fly More Combo Drone with Remote Controller with a Screen Gray at Best Buy. Find low everyday prices and buy online for delivery or in-store pick-up. Price Match Guarantee.

reviews.name: Great drone, obstacle avoidance isn’t on this one!
reviews.reviewBody: This was a great first drone to buy. I wish I would have known about the DJI mini three pro though because I would have loved to got the obstacle avoidance. I’ll save you guys. The trouble do not buy this drone as a first drone. Go ahead and spend the extra money to get the obstacle avoidance. I learned the hard way so you don’t have to. I will save the content I have been able to capture with this drone has been amazing. As far as I’m able to fly away and as high is also insane. Do yourself a favor though and make sure to get the pro version of whatever one you decide to go with I am currently buying the mini four pro. Really I would suggest going on YouTube and just watch reviews on each one of them and go from there and which one you think you would like best. I’m all about putting out real reviews that are not paid for. I do understand that I’m being put into a drawing for something. I never win anything. So this is my honest opinion.!

reviews.name: Very happy with my mini 3
reviews.reviewBody: Very happy with my mini 3 fly more drone. Everything was included that was listed in the description, I only mentioned because of a couple of other posts here. Had to look the bag over real good because I found it has a few well hidden zipped pockets that included the blades and cables for charging, such a small compact package for a bit I thought it might be missing parts but everything was there. Being my first drone I found it easy to fly and being that it's a DJI product pretty much idiot proof and a good choice for a beginner..takes great videos and pictures..couldn’t be happier with it..just watch a few first time flying the mini 3 videos and you'll be on your way.

reviews.name: Great for beginners.
reviews.reviewBody: Awesome product. Quality is amazing. Takes a few tries to get use to it but once you do its just fun.

primaryImage.altText: Alt View 11. DJI - Geek Squad Certified Refurbished Mini 3 Fly More Combo Drone with Remote Controller with a Screen - Gray.

features.title: Lightweight and Compact
features.description: Mini 3 weighs under 249 g. Perfect for taking with you on your adventures, from hikes, road trips, and beach days.

features.title: Extended Battery Life
features.description: With up to 38 minutes of battery life, you can take Mini 3 out at every stop along the way or fly long flights without worrying about the battery.

features.title: Stunning Imagery
features.description: Film in 4K HDR Video for crystal clear aerial shots. Capture details in highlights and shadows, both day and night.

features.title: Capture Height, Be Social
features.description: With True Vertical Shooting, you can easily capture tall landmarks like skyscrapers and waterfalls. And after capturing, it's in the perfect orientation to post to Instagram or TikTok.

features.title: Focus on the moment
features.description: Epic shots are at your fingertips. Use QuickShots to choose dynamic flight patterns or capture a stunning view with Panorama.

features.title: Flying is a Breeze
features.description: Don't let a little wind get in your way. Mini 3 is resistant to 38kph winds (level 5), so you can stay steady and capture your shot.

features.title: DJI RC
features.description: Includes the new DJI RC, which has the DJI Fly App pre-installed and a built-in 5.5-inch HD display for crisp viewing even in direct sunlight.

name: Snaptain - P30 4K Drone with Camera GPS and Remote Controller - Grey
description: Shop Snaptain P30 4K Drone with Camera GPS and Remote Controller Grey at Best Buy. Find low everyday prices and buy online for delivery or in-store pick-up. Price Match Guarantee.

reviews.name: Decent drone for the price.
reviews.reviewBody: Over all a good drone. Its easy to fly as long as you get it set up correctly each flight. Ive had it up twice and it would just fly in a uncontrollable circle. I figured out that it was the way i was setting it up for gps and gyro. Other than that one issue it takes decent photos and videos.

reviews.name: Great For Beginners
reviews.reviewBody: It’s a very steady drone with good range. Has long battery life and a functioning camera. Just need to download an app and connect to it. Super easy to set up and starting to enjoy its performance. The drone was also stable even in windy weather. Perfect for beginners and older children.

reviews.name: Great beginner drone.
reviews.reviewBody: Very good beginner drone. It is relatively simple to learn to operate.  Could have better battery life. Takes decent pictures. It does seem to lose GPS signal often but reconnects relatively quickly.

Snaptain P30 GPS Drone with Remote Controller

descriptions.long: Introducing the Snaptain P30, a compact yet powerful drone that's perfect for enthusiasts of all levels. With its built-in GPS and impressive 4K UHD camera, this drone is designed to comply with regulations at a mere 249g. Whether you're embarking on thrilling outdoor adventures or capturing the vibrant essence of urban life, the P30 is your versatile companion, ready to conquer any challenge. Get ready to capture stunning photos and videos from every angle with the Snaptain P30.

features.title: Lightweight and compact
features.description: P30 weighs under 249 g.Drone is compact, foldable, and easy to transport. It's the perfect travel companion for your next adventure, and it doesn't require registration in most countries.

features.title: 4K UHD video
features.description: Capture breathtaking aerial footage with our 4K UHD camera, featuring an adjustable lens for capturing different angles. View your footage in real-time on your phone for a truly immersive experience.

features.title: Flying is a breeze
features.description: P30 features built-in GPS for precise and effortless positioning. If the signal is lost or the battery is running low, the drone will automatically fly back to its starting point using the Return to Home feature.

features.title: Extended flight coverage
features.description: 5GHz Wi-Fi FPV real-time transmission provides 1640ft and smooth image transmission (Please confirm that your device supports 5G signal transmission); the remote-control range can be as long as 2600ft.Enjoy stunning aerial views without any lag or disruption.

features.title: User-friendly and safe controls
features.description: P30 comes equipped with an easy-to-use remote controller and a mobile app that streams video directly to your phone. Features such as Point of Interest and Waypoints make flying simpler, while real-time flight data ensures safety.

features.title: Fly responsibly
features.description: The following website may help you make informed decisions about flying your drone: KnowBeforeYouFly.org. Additional state or local requirements may apply. Check your local jurisdiction.

reviews.name: A Great Drone for Enthusiasts and Professionals
reviews.reviewBody:
I have been using drones for my hobby for a few years. I have owned and used many different drones, but the DJI Mavic 3 Classic is one of the best drones that I have ever used.

The Mavic 3 Classic has a 20MP Hasselblad camera that produces stunning images and videos. The camera has a variable aperture that allows you to control the depth of field, and it also has a 10-bit color depth that provides more accurate colors. The Mavic 3 Classic also has a number of features that make it ideal for enthusiast and professional use, such as obstacle avoidance, automatic flight modes, and a long battery life.

I used the M3C for a few months, and I have been very impressed with it. I highly recommend it to anyone who is looking for a high-quality drone that is not as expensive as the Mavic 3 Pro.

Pros:

- 20MP Hasselblad camera with variable aperture and 10-bit color depth
- Stunning image and video quality
- Obstacle avoidance
- Automatic flight modes
- Long battery life
- Affordable price

Cons:

- Not as portable as some other drones
- Can be difficult to fly in windy conditions

Overall, the DJI Mavic 3 Classic is an excellent drone that is perfect for enthusiasts and professionals who are looking for a high-quality drone without breaking the bank. I purchased the Mavic 3 Classic from Best Buy, and I was very happy with the service I received. The drone was delivered on time, and it was well-packaged. I would definitely recommend Best Buy to anyone who is looking to purchase a drone.

reviews.name: Taking Flight: A Review of the DJI Mavic 3
reviews.reviewBody:
I recently got my hands on the DJI Mavic 3 Drone, and I have to say, I'm blown away by its capabilities. As someone who enjoys photography and videography, I was excited to see what this high-end drone could do.

Right off the bat, I was impressed by the drone's camera. The 20-megapixel sensor and 3-axis gimbal make it easy to capture smooth, steady footage that looks professional. I was especially impressed by the drone's ability to shoot 4K video at 60 frames per second - the footage looks incredibly crisp and detailed.

But what really sets the DJI Mavic 3 Drone apart is its obstacle avoidance system. I was a bit nervous about flying the drone, but the sensors on all sides of the drone made it easy to avoid obstacles and fly with confidence. I was able to capture footage from unique angles and perspectives that I never would have been able to get otherwise.

One of the other things that really stood out to me was the drone's battery life. With up to 45 minutes of flight time on a single charge, I was able to capture a ton of footage without having to worry about the battery dying. This was especially helpful when I was trying to capture a specific shot that required a bit of extra time.

Overall, I would highly recommend the DJI Mavic 3 Drone to anyone who is serious about aerial photography and videography. It's packed with advanced features and benefits, and is sure to impress even the most demanding professionals.

reviews.name: Mavic 3 Classic - great camera, great drone
reviews.reviewBody:
Mavic 3 Classic is a great drone. It hits a sweet spot when the Mavic 3 Pro is too much. I was originally looking at the Pro but to be honest, I really didn't need to zoom cameras. If I wanted parallax for video then I'd go for the Cine. (Video on the non-Cine versions is "ok" - though nothing in the Mavic 3 series will approach ProRes RAW or CDNG with the Inspire 2/3 series) The 1" sensor with the Hasselblad glass makes it. The Air series is great, but with a fixed aperture, it doesn't give the flexibility that the Mavic 3 series does. The airframe is the classic Mavic 3 with the associated flight time. It still handles like a Mavic (if you're used to FPV, Inspires, or Alta it's a dog.) But- if you're used to Minis or even Skydio- it flies MUCH better. DJI just makes great products.

Photos:  Mavic 3 Classic, Mavic 3 Classic camera, Mavic 3 Pro, Mavic 3 Pro camera, Mavic 3 Classic and Mavic 3 Pro side by side.

descriptions.long: With powerful flight performance and a Hasselblad camera, Mavic 3 Classic delivers the absolute essence of flagship imaging. Take it on any adventure to create unforgettable work.

specifications.definition: The product can be connected to a program or software application on a mobile device, which then receives collected data from the product.
Refers to the types of connections that devices use to interact and communicate with each other.

CCD and CMOS are the two main technologies used in image sensors. CCD, the older of the two types, turns analog light signals into digital pixels. This conversion happens without distortion, resulting in high-quality images. Newer CMOS sensors use transistors at each pixel to move electrical charges. CMOS sensors are typically less expensive, but also require more light to create distortion-free images.
A support that pivots and stabilizes the camera.

features.title: Create to inspire with the Hasselblad camera
features.description: The iconic Swedish brand Hasselblad designed and built the L2D-20c aerial camera just for the Mavic 3 Series, embedding a professional-grade 4/3 CMOS in an unbelievably compact space.

features.title: Professional imaging
features.description: 5.1K/50fps, 4K/120fps, 10-bit D-Log, HLG, and Night Shots, creators have multiple tools to bring them to the next level.

features.title: Extended flight time
features.description: Compatible with all Mavic 3 series batteries, allowing for 40 min of hovering time and 46 min flight time.

features.title: Omnidirectional obstacle sensing
features.description: With APAS 5.0, when flying, Mavic 3 Classic continually senses objects in all directions and bypasses them quickly and smoothly. Even new pilots can fly confidently and safely, and create smooth footage even in complicated scenarios.

features.title: 9.3miles HD video transmission
features.description: DJI O3+ transmission can transmit a 1080p/60fps live feed. This means the camera view is displayed at specifications close to what the camera actually records. It also makes Mavic 3 Classic more responsive to your control.

features.title: Advanced RTH
features.description: The updated auto-return function enables Mavic 3 Classic to automatically determine the optimal route back to its home point and execute it quickly.

features.title: DJI RC
features.description: Supports DJI O3+ video transmission technology with a lightweight body, HD display, and ultra-long battery life.

features.title: Fly Responsibly
features.description: The following website may help you make informed decisions about flying your drone: KnowBeforeYouFly.org.  Additional state or local requirements may apply.  Check your local jurisdiction.

reviews.name: DJI Mini 2
reviews.reviewBody: I had a DJI mini 2 and I crashed it. luckily I had the extended warranty that I paid $180 for which I shouldn't have because that's too expensive and I originally paid $600 for this drone plus tax about $636 total. So they gave me a gift card because they didn't have any in stock whenever I returned it so I went to their website and I bought another one. They were only $300 now but there was one for $270 that was refurbished so I took the chance and it was okay. And after flying it three times I crashed it again because even though it was a low battery, I knew it was going to be low and I was going to land it in front of me and I forgot that when it hits 10% it goes straight up in the air and starts going back to where it took off from but it could not go straight up in the air because there was a tree above it and so it flew up and hit the tree and it broke the arm on this one too... I did not have the extended warranty now but I just bought a $20 replacement arm on Amazon without the motors to repair it, which will void any warranty maybe? I'm going to try to reuse everything in it, it's just one little broken section. I will add a picture to it and I think it's better to spend $20 for a replacement plastic arm instead of $180 for extended warranty that once you use it you lose it. so I recommend this because it's a really high quality drone but it does not Auto follow you but you don't really need that anyway. just stay away from trees and power lines and whenever you take off be sure there's nothing straight above you because it's going to try to go straight up and then straight down in the same place and whenever it gets down to 15% battery. you better land immediately because if not it's going to fly straight up and hit something on its own trying to get back home. I recommend this.

reviews.name: Was just like new, absolutely no issues!
reviews.reviewBody: Came in perfect shape. Wasn’t sure about the “refurbished” approach but it was exactly like new. Batteries held a perfect charge. I’ve been having tons of fun flying this thing around my house, local parks, etc. It takes great footage! I did get a Pelican case (the 1400) to keep it safe. Fits perfectly.

reviews.name: This is one awesome drone!
reviews.reviewBody: This is one awesome drone! Mine came in pretty much brand new condition, only flown for a few minutes. It is so stable the video quality is awesome. Qualified for DJI's 2 year warranty purchase. My expectations are beyond exceeded. Don't think, buy now!

primaryImage.altText: Front. DJI - Geek Squad Certified Refurbished DJI Mini 2 Fly More Combo Quadcopter with Remote Controller.

descriptions.long:
Geek Squad® Certified Refurbished products are thoroughly, painstakingly and lovingly tested, so you can be sure that your device will work right, right away. Geek Squad® Certified Refurbished products.

DJI Mini 2 is beginner-friendly, powerful, and well, mini. Impressive performance, stunning image quality, and creative videos are just a few taps away. Explore an entirely new perspective, capturing the moments that make your life truly yours.

values: Geek Squad Certified Refurbished DJI Mini 2 Fly More Combo Quadcopter with Remote Controller

canonicalValues.value: Geek Squad Certified Refurbished DJI Mini 2 Fly More Combo Quadcopter with Remote Controller

features.title: Pack Light, Fly Free
features.description: Just how light is DJI Mini 2? At less than 249 g, it weighs about as much as an apple and fits in the palm of your hand. Compact and convenient, Mini 2 is your ideal travel companion, transforming how you capture your favorite memories.

features.title: Small But Mighty
features.description: Thanks to intuitive and advanced features packed in a portable frame, DJI Mini 2 provides complete freedom wherever and however you want to create. Whether you’re shooting at a deserted beach or capturing the details of a fun family reunion, Mini 2 can handle it all.

features.title: Powerful Performance
features.description: With a max battery life of 31 minutes, DJI Mini 2 grants more than enough time to compose the perfect shot. Mini 2 can resist level 5 winds and take off at a max altitude of 4,000 meters.

features.title: OcuSync 2.0 Video Transmission
features.description: Mini 2 supports up to 10 km of HD video transmission and has excellent anti-interference capabilities, giving you the ability to fly farther and see clearer.

features.title: 3-Axis Gimbal with 4K Camera
features.description: A 12MP camera in the sky delivers content guaranteed to impress. Along with 4K/30fps video and a 3-axis motorized gimbal, Mini 2 ensures stunning image quality that is consistently smooth no matter how adventurous your piloting gets.

features.title: 4x Zoom
features.description: 4x digital zoom makes it safer and more convenient when transitioning between shots of varying distance and composition.

features.title: QuickShots
features.description: With just a few taps, DJI Mini 2 automatically records and shoots professional-level videos to share directly on social media. Whether you’re a beginner or a more experienced flyer, the DJI Fly app helps you produce impressive results complete with soundtracks and filters.

features.title: Panorama
features.description: Select from Wide-Angle, 180°, and Sphere panoramas, and DJI Mini 2 will do the rest, generating a panoramic masterpiece almost instantly.

features.title: Enhanced Photo
features.description: The DJI Fly app features intelligent, built-in photo optimization. The app automatically enhances image quality after downloading a photo, resulting in vivid colors and details that pop.

features.title: Simplified Flight for Stunning Content
features.description: DJI Mini 2 carefully optimizes user experience and intelligent features. Thanks to Smart Return to Home, automatic takeoff, and precise hovering, operation is more streamlined and safer than ever. The possibilities are endless when the sky is your playground.

features.title: Fly Spots
features.description: Not sure where to fly? Figuring out where to take off no longer needs to be a headache. Plan your itinerary in advance with the DJI Fly app, and you might even come across another aerial photography enthusiast.

features.title: QuickTransfer
features.description: When Mini 2 is close to your smartphone, the DJI Fly app will automatically recognize and connect to the aircraft and synchronize selected photos and videos at 20 MB/s.

features.title: Trimmed Download
features.description: With this new feature, you can easily cut out a segment of your footage to edit and download. Hunting for your favorite shot or worrying about insufficient storage is a thing of the past.

features.title: Imaginative Templates
features.description: The intuitive editor of the DJI Fly app includes a diverse set of creative templates. Flying, shooting, editing, and sharing can be done almost instantly, allowing you to create and share on the go.

features.title: Fly Responsibly:
features.description: The following website may help you make informed decisions about flying your drone: KnowBeforeYouFly.org. Additional state or local requirements may apply. Check your local jurisdiction.

Each battery last me 35 min and the camera quality is so good if even zooms in and go 35 mph and that is pretty fast for a drone that goes 500 meters up this drone will be the best for a starter kit

reviews.name: My first drone! ♡ I love it.
reviews.reviewBody: The best and first drone I have ever bought. The quality of the camera is indisputable, the stability is incredible. The battery lasts quite a while. I have no complaints, I am very happy with this DJI Mini 4 Pro.

features.title: Lightweight and Compact
features.description: Mini 3 weighs under 249 g. Perfect for taking with you on your adventures, from hikes, road trips, and beach days.

features.title: Extended Battery Life
features.description: With up to 38 minutes of battery life, you can take Mini 3 out at every stop along the way or fly long flights without worrying about the battery.

features.title: Stunning Imagery
features.description: Film in 4K HDR Video for crystal clear aerial shots. Capture details in highlights and shadows, both day and night.

features.title: Capture Height, Be Social
features.description: With True Vertical Shooting, you can easily capture tall landmarks like skyscrapers and waterfalls. And after capturing, it's in the perfect orientation to post to Instagram or TikTok.

features.title: Focus on the moment
features.description: Epic shots are at your fingertips. Use QuickShots to choose dynamic flight patterns or capture a stunning view with Panorama.

features.title: Flying is a Breeze
features.description: Don't let a little wind get in your way. Mini 3 is resistant to 38kph winds (level 5), so you can stay steady and capture your shot.

features.title: DJI RC
features.description: Includes the new DJI RC, which has the DJI Fly App pre-installed and a built-in 5.5-inch HD display for crisp viewing even in direct sunlight.

features.title: Fly Responsibly
features.description: The following website may help you make informed decisions about flying your drone: KnowBeforeYouFly.org. Additional state or local requirements may apply. Check your local jurisdiction.
